import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { User } from 'src/app/interface/auth'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.scss'] }) export class SignupComponent { user!: User submitted: boolean = false constructor( private fb: FormBuilder, ){} }
